data.subject: Serpent Recoil
data.lyric:
Serpent monolith
 Exhaling cipher
 Of millennial doubt
 Carved in soil
 Erect in myth
 Memory
 Of so

data.subject: Cognition Of Rebirth
data.lyric:
Cancerous Redeemer
 Sick touch of the black
 Awaken into new worlds
 Adjust to foreign eyes
 Our own

data.subject: Viral Kinesis
data.lyric:
Anoint. Alight. Align
 The Mind says, "I am not of the Body

data.subject: Seance In A Warrior`s Memory
data.lyric:
Rotten staff
 My Sceptre
 Sword of might
 Swath Cutter
 Shining Pestilence
 Piercing storms
 Heraldi

data.subject: Descension
data.lyric:
Fivefold angles of Degrees
 72 in number binding within
 Inverted chaos
 As spears impale wings
 
 S
